item.title: 英国赛捷公司称，关税 "噪音 "导致企业客户消费缓慢
item.description: 英国软件公司赛捷（Sage）表示，其小型企业客户有现金，但由于美国关税带来的不确定性而不愿花钱，尽管该公司周四坚持其全年增长预测。【原文：British software company Sage said its small business customers have cash but are reluctant to spend it because of uncertainty linked to U.S. tariffs, although it on Thursday stuck to its full-year growth forecast.】

item.title: 中国指责美国 "滥用 "对华为人工智能芯片的出口管制措施
item.description: 中国周四指责美国 "滥用出口管制措施"，并敦促华盛顿纠正其做法，因为美国发布了警告企业不要使用华为Ascend人工智能芯片的指导意见。【原文：China on Thursday accused the United States of "abusing export control measures" and urged Washington to correct its practices after the U.S. issued guidance warning companies not to use Huawei's Ascend AI chips.】

item.title: 独家报道为规避美国关税，Shein 将在越南建立大型仓库
item.description: 此举可降低其在不可预测的中美贸易紧张局势中的风险敞口。【原文：The move could reduce its exposure to unpredictable US-China trade tensions.】

item.title: 欧元区经济增长下调，但就业率保持稳定
item.description: 欧盟统计局（Eurostat）周四公布的数据显示，欧元区第一季度经济增长速度低于最初估计，但就业率保持良好，这表明尽管多年来欧元区经济扩张乏力，但该集团仍在不断创造就业机会。【原文：The euro zone economy grew slower in the first quarter than initially estimated but employment held up well, indicating that the bloc keeps creating jobs despite years of anaemic expansion, data from Eurostat showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 斯泰兰特将把玛莎拉蒂生产基地迁回摩德纳老家
item.description: 汽车制造商 Stellantis 周四表示，玛莎拉蒂跑车的生产将在今年年底前从都灵的 Mirafiori 工厂转移到摩德纳。【原文：Automaker Stellantis said on Thursday that the production of Maserati sports cars will be moved from Turin's Mirafiori plant to Modena by the end of the year.】

item.title: 特朗普称美国必须先偿还债务再建立主权财富基金
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周四表示，在建立主权财富基金之前，美国需要先偿还债务，这标志着在一年内建立基金的计划可能发生转变。【原文：The U.S. needs to pay off debt before establishing a sovereign wealth fund, President Donald Trump said on Thursday, signalling a potential shift to plans to create a fund within a year.】

item.title: 美国关税冲击之后，戛纳电影市场谨慎如常
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）提议对外国制作的电影征收 100%的关税，这让买家和卖家在一片不确定的阴云下踏入今年的戛纳电影市场。【原文：Buyers and sellers are heading into this year's Cannes Film Market under a cloud of uncertainty as the initial shock of U.S. President Donald Trump's proposed 100% tariff on foreign-made films has faded into a cautious business-as-usual approach.】

item.title: 柬埔寨与美国举行贸易谈判，49% 的关税影响前景
item.description: 柬埔寨政府周四表示，柬埔寨已在华盛顿与美国举行了首轮贸易谈判，试图就特朗普政府征收的最高关税税率之一进行谈判。【原文：Cambodia has held its first round of trade talks with the United States in Washington, its government said on Thursday, as it tries to negotiate over one of the highest tariff rates imposed by the Trump administration.】

item.title: 日本炼油企业减少脱碳努力，重新关注化石燃料
item.description: 在全球转向使用更稳定、更具成本效益的化石燃料之际，日本石油公司正在缩减脱碳计划，包括氢气和合成氨项目。【原文：Japanese oil companies are scaling back decarbonisation initiatives, including hydrogen and ammonia projects, amid a global shift towards more stable and cost-effective fossil fuels.】

item.title: Stanchart 在投资银行的推动下建立美国私募股权团队
item.description: 渣打银行（Standard Chartered）周四表示，该行已成立了一个专门负责私募股权公司、对冲基金和主权财富基金的团队，作为其投资银行争取更多金融客户业务的广泛举措的一部分。【原文：Standard Chartered has created a dedicated team covering private equity firms, hedge funds and sovereign wealth funds, as part of a wider drive in its investment bank to win more business from financial clients, the bank said on Thursday.】

item.title: 国际能源署预测 2025 年剩余时间全球石油需求增长将放缓至每天 65 万桶
item.description: 国际能源机构（IEA）周四表示，经济逆风加上电动汽车（EV）创纪录的销量，将使2025年剩余时间内的全球石油需求增长降至每天65万桶。【原文：The International Energy Agency (IEA) on Thursday said that economic headwinds, combined with record sales of electric vehicles (EV), will reduce global oil demand growth to 650,000 barrels per day (bpd) for the remainder of 2025.】

item.title: 尽管日本 MUFG 第四季度利润下滑 41%，但其年度利润仍创下历史新高
item.description: 日本最大的银行集团三菱日联金融集团（Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group）在第四季度利润下降 41% 的情况下，全年净利润仍创下历史新高。【原文：Japan's largest banking group Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group clocked a record annual net profit even as fourth-quarter profit fell by 41%.】

item.title: 特朗普印度向美国提出零关税贸易协议
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周四在多哈表示，印度已向美国提出零关税的贸易协议。【原文：U.S President Donald Trump said on Thursday in Doha that India had offered the U.S a trade deal with zero tariffs.】

item.title: 育碧股价暴跌，因其将进一步烧钱
item.description: 视频游戏生产商育碧公司周四股价大幅下跌，因为这家法国游戏开发商预计今年的现金收入仍将为负数，而营业收入则有望实现收支平衡。【原文：Shares in video game maker Ubisoft dropped heavily on Thursday after the French game developer guided for this year's cash generation to remain negative, while expecting its operating income at a breakeven.】

item.title: 法国无人机制造商派诺特第一季度收入增长
item.description: 法国无人机制造商派诺特（Parrot）周四报告称，受欧洲和全球国防预算激增的推动，其第一季度收入有所增长。【原文：French drone maker Parrot reported a rise in its first-quarter revenue on Thursday, propelled by a surge in European and global defence budgets.】

item.title: 德国商业银行员工对联合信贷银行说 "不"，工会担心可能裁员
item.description: 约 200 名德国商业银行员工周四早些时候举行抗议活动，反对联合信贷银行（UniCredit）可能收购这家德国银行。【原文：Some 200 Commerzbank employees protested early Thursday against a possible takeover of the German lender by UniCredit.】

item.title: 特朗普在北京的人如何从贸易全球主义者摇身一变成为对华鹰派
item.description: 美国新任驻华大使戴维-珀杜（David Perdue）本周抵达北京。【原文：David Perdue, the new U.S. envoy to China, arrives in Beijing this week.】

item.title: 2025 年初，英国经济增长速度超过预期
item.description: 英国官方周四公布的数据显示，3 月份英国经济意外增长，推动 2025 年第一季度的产出创下一年来最大增幅，这将受到英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）的欢迎。【原文：Britain's economy unexpectedly grew in March to push up output over the first quarter of 2025 by the most in a year, according to official data on Thursday that will be welcomed by finance minister Rachel Reeves.】

item.title: 零售商急于拯救美国夏季购物季
item.description: 在华盛顿和中国政府同意暂时削减关税后，包括沃尔玛和几家服装品牌在内的美国零售商正争先恐后地为五月下旬开始的夏季购物旺季采购中国制造的商品。【原文：U.S. retailers including Walmart and several clothing brands are racing to secure China-made merchandise for the busy summer shopping season starting in late May after Washington and Beijing agreed to temporarily slash tariffs.】

item.title: 日本投资者因贸易乐观情绪将外资股买盘扩大至第八周
item.description: 日本投资者连续第八周抢购外国股票，原因是美国贸易谈判取得进展，对贸易战对全球经济影响的担忧有所缓解，从而提振了投资者情绪。【原文：Japanese investors snapped up foreign stocks for an eighth straight week, as progress in U.S. trade negotiations and easing concerns over the global economic impact of a trade war lifted investor sentiment.】

item.title: 第一季度核心利润略超预期，德国电信上调指导原则
item.description: 德国电信周四公布的第一季度核心利润略高于分析师预期，并小幅上调了全年业绩指引。【原文：Deutsche Telekom reported a first-quarter core profit slightly above analyst expectations on Thursday and marginally lifted its full-year guidance.】

item.title: 日本财政困境考验日本央行缩减债券计划
item.description: 有关大规模财政支出的言论以及随之而来的超长收益率飙升，正在引发人们对日本央行能够多快缩减债券购买规模的疑问，这也加剧了日本央行在消除大规模货币刺激政策残余方面所面临的挑战。【原文：Talk of big fiscal spending and a subsequent spike in super-long yields are raising questions over just how quickly the Bank of Japan can taper its bond purchases, adding to the challenges it faces in removing remnants of its massive monetary stimulus.】

item.title: 蒂森克虏伯维持展望，预计下半年环境将更加稳定
item.description: 蒂森克虏伯公司周四表示，维持本财年的业绩展望，并预计 2025 年下半年的市场环境将更加稳定，此前，价格和需求下降以及与维护相关的停工导致季度利润骤降。【原文：Thyssenkrupp kept its outlook for the fiscal year and expects a more stable market environment in the second half of 2025, it said on Thursday, after lower prices and demand as well as maintenance-related shutdowns caused quarterly profit to plunge.】

item.title: 第一季度业绩强劲，特朗普关税迷雾为欧洲公司前景蒙上阴影
item.description: 欧洲公司（Europe Inc）经受住了美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税政策引发的动荡，实现了弹性十足的第一季度盈利，但尽管新近达成了贸易休战，投资者仍面临着不确定性的迷雾。【原文：Europe Inc has weathered the turbulence sparked by U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff policies to deliver resilient first-quarter earnings, but in spite of the newly-minted trade truce, investors still face a fog of uncertainty.】

item.title: 第二季度业绩超预期，西门子确认增长前景
item.description: 德国工程集团西门子公司周四表示，"尽管不确定性增加"，该公司仍预计全年销售额将增长 3% 至 7%，该公司第二季度利润好于预期。【原文：Siemens still expects to increase its full-year sales by between 3 and 7% "despite increased uncertainty", the German engineering group said on Thursday, as it reported better-than-expected profit during its second quarter.】

item.title: 欧洲 随着亢奋情绪消退，鲍威尔开始行动
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：美国准备削减银行资本要求
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周四报道，美国当局正准备宣布削减银行的资本要求。【原文：Authorities in the United States are preparing to announce cuts to banks' capital requirements, the Financial Times reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 在特朗普的不确定性影响下，日本央行将在 9 月前暂停加息
item.description: 路透社的一项调查显示，大多数经济学家目前预计日本央行将在9月份之前维持利率不变，因为日本央行将暂停评估美国关税的影响，但仍有略微多数的经济学家认为日本央行将在年底前至少加息25个基点。【原文：Most economists now expect the Bank of Japan will hold interest rates through September as it pauses to assess the effects of U.S. tariffs, a Reuters survey showed, although a slight majority still see at least a 25-basis-point hike by year-end.】

item.title: 特朗普访问阿联酋，阿联酋希望推进人工智能雄心
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周四将结束对卡塔尔的短暂访问，向美军发表讲话，然后飞往阿拉伯联合酋长国，该国领导人希望美国帮助这个富裕的海湾国家成为人工智能领域的全球领导者。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump was due to end a brief trip to Qatar with a speech to U.S. troops on Thursday then fly to the United Arab Emirates, where leaders hope for U.S. help to make the wealthy Gulf nation a global leader in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 日产汽车正在进行大规模裁员。扭转销售局面将更加困难
item.description: 分析师表示，日产汽车新任首席执行官伊万-埃斯皮诺萨（Ivan Espinosa）面临着一项艰巨的任务，他无法保证这家陷入困境的日本汽车制造商能够扭转一线销售下滑的局面，即使他在努力削减成本。【原文：Nissan's new chief executive Ivan Espinosa faces an uphill task turning around the troubled Japanese automaker with no guarantee it can reverse sliding top-line sales, analysts said, even as he moves to slash costs.】
